scripts.install:all: npm --prefix frontend ci && npm --prefix backend ci
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.test: npm --prefix frontend run test && npm --prefix backend run test
scripts.lint: npm --prefix frontend run lint && npm --prefix backend run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix frontend run lint:fix && npm --prefix backend run lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: npm --prefix frontend exec tsc -- --noEmit && npm --prefix backend exec tsc -- --noEmit
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
